title: Bloomberg Markets: Tillerson Signals Impatience With China
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Tillerson Signals Impatience With China
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Nick Wadhams\u0010Foreign Policy Reporter \u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing Secretary of State Rex Tillerson signaled the Trump administration’s growing impatience with China on issues from North Korea to trade, saying now’s the time to go public with concerns that the U.S. has raised privately with the country’s leaders for months.\u0010{NSN OY31KS6JIJUP }

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
